name: lssel
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(c2, c3))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(c2, c3))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(c2, c3))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, c3))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, c3))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(clss, c4))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ⊆ c3)
⊣ c3 =(Base ` c4)
⊣ c1 =(LSubSp ` c4)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(c2, c3))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(clss, c4))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c0)→ c2 ∈ c3)
⊣ c3 =(Base ` c4)
⊣ c1 =(LSubSp ` c4)

comment: A subspace member is a vector. (Contributed by NM, 11-Jan-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Jan-2015.)
